Spells:
Bull's Strength (D2 Tran): Touched gains +4 Strength for 5 min
Detect Animals Or Plants (D1 Divi): R600' Cone gives self info on animals and plants for conc or 50 min
Detect Magic (D0 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on magical auras for conc or 5 min

Flare (D0 Evoc): R35' Target dazzled (DC 12 Fort neg) for 1 min
Know Direction (D0 Divi): Self learns direction of north
Produce Flame (D1 Evoc): Creates throwable torch flames that inflict 1d6+5 HP for 5 min
Resistance (D0 Abju): Touched gains +1 saves for 1 min
Shillelagh (D1 Tran): S/M/L staff gains +1 attack, 1d8+1/2d6+1/3d6+1 damage (DC 13 Will neg) for 5 min
Wood Shape (D2 Tran): Self reshapes 15' cu of wood (DC 14 Will neg)
Magic Notes:
Wisdom Druid Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level D1, D2
Enlarge Spell: May use +1 spell slot to dbl chosen spell range
Natural Spell: May cast spells during Wild Shape
Scribe Scroll: May create scroll of any known spell
Spontaneous Druid Spell: May cast Summon Nature's Ally in place of known spell
Widen Spell: May use +3 spell slot to dbl chosen spell area of affect
Wild Shape: May change into creature of size small-medium for 5 hr 1/dy
